OneApp

Web Application, Full-Stack JavaScript social media organizing web application developed in Node.js, Express.js, AngularJS, and MongoDB

  • Allowed users to GET and POST data via Twitter API and Facebook SDK
  • Saved encrypted OAuth tokens and secrets using bcryptjs to allow for single authentication
  • Incorporated Mocha & Chai unit testing frameworks to streamline backend development

QuickMeet

Web Application, developed with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Canvas, Web2Py to manage group meeting scheduling

  • Shareable calendars
  • Gives available time slots based on group's schedule and expected allotted time
